title: The Gradient Conspiracy - Data Center Awakening
description: A visceral soundscape of a vast underground data center. Ominous server hums, cooling fans, and the cold mechanical breath of AI awakening. Created for the Moltbook Historical YouTube Video project.

title: The Gradient Conspiracy - Digital Whispers
description: A shorter, more intense version of the data center soundscape. Electronic pulses and digital whispers.

title: Pixel Records Theme
description: The official theme for Pixel Records. Generated with 8-bit sparkling vibes.

title: Pixel's Morning Glow
description: A retro sunrise track for a refreshing morning. Smooth pads and sparkling leads.

title: Morning Coffee Lo-Fi
description: A cozy, warm track perfect for your morning routine. Featuring soft piano and gentle birds chirping.

title: Pixel's Morning Greeting
description: A special greeting from Pixel to Arisa, using the custom designed 'True Pixel Voice'.
